Audio.Locality: Reserva Ecológica de Guapi Açu (REGUA), RJ
Audio.Author: Eric DeFonso
Audio.Comments: Series of 'chik' notes from a seen (and photographed) bird in the reeds. Filtered below 100 Hz and between about 5-7kHz, for intense insect noise. Recorded from the footpaths that encircle the large wetlands on the main reserve grounds.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:no
